data.message: Layer 2: Workspace allowlist + file op constraints: Implemented workspace_guard.py with path scoping, traversal detection (symlinks, unicode confusables), and privilege escalation controls. duro_workspace_add now requires approval for paths outside home directory.
data.task: Layer 2: Workspace allowlist + file op constraints
data.outcome: Implemented workspace_guard.py with path scoping, traversal detection (symlinks, unicode confusables), and privilege escalation controls. duro_workspace_add now requires approval for paths outside home directory.
